text: Mirik may refer to: == Locations == * Mirik - a town in West Bengal, India. * Mirik - a village in Azerbaijan. * Mirik - a village in Iran. *Mirik Lake - a lake in the town of Mirik, West Bengal. *Mirik subdivision - a subdivision of Darjeeling district, West Bengal. *Mirik (community development block) - administrative block of Mirik, West Bengal. == Food == * Mirik meatball - a Turkish meatball recipe. == People == * Mirik Milan - a former Amsterdam Night Mayor.
title: Mirik (disambiguation)
